GSP28jsbh3-2u:1226_0: prathamataḥ pītapratibaddhavatsāmityatreva pītapadaṃ bhāve niṣṭhāntaṃ pānavācakamaṅgīkṛtya
GSP28jsbh3-2u:1226_1: pītamasyāstītyarthe arśāādyacaṃ kṛtvā indraḥ pānavān yasmin savane ityevaṃ samānādhikaraṇabahuvrīhirevetyarthaḥ /

GSP28jsbh3-2u:1230_2: 'pyaviruddhatvāt sarvabhakṣāṅgatvamityabhipretya ūhapakṣanirāsena saha siddhāntamupasaṃharati ------- ata iti //

GSP28jsbh3-2u:1233: evaṃ samānādhikaraṇabahuvrīhiṇopapāditasiddhāntopasaṃhāre kṛte punaḥ siṃhāvalokananyāyena tatra dūṣaṇamupanyasya tatparihāreṇa siddhāntamupapādayati -------- yadi tviti //
GSP28jsbh3-2u:1237: niṣṭheti sūtreṇa kṛtakṛtyaḥ pītodakaḥ ityādiṣviva niṣṭhāntasya pūrvanipātāpattirastyevetyarthaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-2u:1241_0: tasyāṃ hi mandrābhibhūtirityārabhya varcasa ityantaṃ paṭhitvā “vasumadgaṇasya somadevate
GSP28jsbh3-2u:1241_1: matividaḥ prātaḥsavanasya gāyatrachandasa indrapītasya narāśaṃsapītasya pitṛpītasya

GSP28jsbh3-2u:1243_2: nirṇīte upasaṃhāranyāyena bhāṣyodāhṛtamantre 'pi tathaiva nirṇayo yuktaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-2u:1244: etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ ------- vasumadgaṇādipadānāṃ asiddhavibhāgakaraṇapūrvako vyavasthayā tattatsavane viniyogo bhāṣyodāhṛtaḥ /

GSP28jsbh3-2u:1247: tasyatu yathādevataṃ vā tatprakṛtitvaṃ hi darśayatītyādyapūrvapakṣanirākaraṇāyottarasūtrapratipāditohapakṣa eveti bhramaṃ nirākartumāha -------- kalpasūtreti //
